snippet: Hybrid Technology said in court papers that it was offering $30 million in cash and would cancel $25 million in debt that Fisker owed Hybrid as its senior secured lender.
abstract: Hybrid Technology bids $55 million for assets of Fisker Automotive, days after bankruptcy judge rejects Hybrid's plan to take over failed electric-vehicle maker in private sale; offers $30 million in cash and will cancel $25 million in debt that Fisker owed Hybrid as its senior secured lender.
lead_paragraph: Hybrid Technology said in court papers that it was offering $30 million in cash and would cancel $25 million in debt that Fisker owed Hybrid as its senior secured lender.

headline.main: Hong Kong Firm Makes Bid for Fisker Automotive Assets
headline.print_headline: Hong Kong Firm Makes Bid for Fisker Automotive Assets
